# I and i-dotless; I-dot and i are case pairs in Turkish and Azeri
# When uppercasing, i turns into a dotted capital I
# 0069; 0069; 0130; 0130; tr; # LATIN SMALL LETTER I
i→İ;
::Any-Upper();
